visualization_prompt: Generate a solid gauge chart showing performance metrics using single-value radial visualization
visualization_explanation: This solid gauge visualization presents a single performance metric (75% completion rate) using radial encoding. The dataset contains one quantitative variable (percentage) with a 0-100 scale. Synthetic data maintains domain validity through constrained percentage ranges. The semi-circular design maximizes data-ink ratio by removing axis lines and non-essential labels. Cairo's preattentive processing is leveraged through size (dominant central value) and color (green = positive connotation). Statistical anchoring is achieved through the 100% scale reference. The 3em font size for the value follows Tufte's principle of maximizing the data-ink ratio while maintaining readability.
